name: A Risky Trade
description:
A Risky Trade is a 2D platformer where the less health you have, the more damage you do. I made this for the third blackthornprod game jam, also this is my first game jam ever so I know its not perfect lol. I'm 100% sure its super buggy and weird, sorry about that. I was really rushed toward the end lol. 

edit: Don't bother trying to play it because I did a stupid and forgot to put the other files you needed to play it in the download.  :|
